original_title: Libre – A Celebration of the Queer Body
overview: Four individuals from the queer community reflect on struggles and personal triumphs that universally translate to open minds and those of a willingness to learn and understand. A visual experience that gives open access to an artistic photoshoot in which the individuals celebrate their queer bodies and complete a journey of expression and self-love.
title: Libre – A Celebration of the Queer Body
